CIPHER.0.cipherString: The people who cast the votes don't decide an election, the people who count the votes do.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: I believe that writing is derivative. I think good writing comes from good reading.
CIPHER.1.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: In 'Next to Normal,' I had millions of breakdowns and panic attacks, but nobody ever heard about those.
CIPHER.2.question: Solve this aristocrat. The letter G maps to O.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: I'd love to be the new Jools Holland, but you know, for, like, cooler people.
CIPHER.3.question: Solve this aristocrat. The first word is I'd.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: Once a month, try something you don't think you'd be good at. You can find such happy surprises.
CIPHER.4.question: Solve this patristocrat.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: I don't need that much to live - we don't need that much to have a wonderful life. I learned that from animals.
CIPHER.5.question: Solve this patristocrat. The letter J maps to E.

CIPHER.6.cipherString: The word love has by no means the same sense for both sexes, and this is one cause of the serious misunderstandings that divide them.
CIPHER.6.question: Solve this patristocrat. The first word is The.

CIPHER.7.cipherString: Tanta prisa tenemos por hacer, escribir y dejar oír nuestra voz en el silencio de la eternidad, que olvidamos lo único realmente importante: vivir
CIPHER.7.question: Solve this xenocrypt. The letter  maps to J.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: Cultivate your curves - they may be dangerous but they won't be avoided.
CIPHER.8.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(17,18).

CIPHER.9.cipherString: I had moments of my actions and words not reflecting who it is I am - if that defines a punk, then yes, absolutely.
CIPHER.9.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(11,23).

CIPHER.10.cipherString: No amount of manifest absurdity…could deter those who wanted to believe from believing.
CIPHER.10.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. The letters N and O map to K and R.

CIPHER.11.cipherString: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
CIPHER.11.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.12.cipherString: There is no greatness where there is no simplicity, goodness and truth.
CIPHER.12.question: Encode this sentence with the Caesar cipher with offset 17.

CIPHER.13.cipherString: You can only govern men by serving them. The rule is without exception.
CIPHER.13.question: Solve this quote which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.14.cipherString: All the world has been converted and Washington is the modem Mecca.
CIPHER.14.question: Encode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword keywords.

CIPHER.15.cipherString: I went to an all-boys school and hated feeling like one of the crowd.
CIPHER.15.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher using the keyword bloggers.

CIPHER.16.cipherString: If I splurge on anything, it's cologne. I love smelling good.
CIPHER.16.question: Decode this sentence with the Porta cipher. The first 5 characters of the sentence is If I .

CIPHER.17.cipherString: When the strong box contains no more both friends and flatterers shun the door.
CIPHER.17.question: A quote has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 2 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.18.cipherString: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
CIPHER.18.question: A quote has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 3 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.19.cipherString: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
CIPHER.19.question: A quote has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 4 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.20.cipherString: God is not present in idols. Your feelings are your god. The soul is your temple.
CIPHER.20.question: A quote has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 4 and 6 rails were used to encode it.
